titles.title: Equity in Transmission of Citizenship Act of 1997

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Technical Corrections Act of 1994 to provide the descendants of female United States citizens born abroad before May 24, 1934, with the same rights to United States citizenship at birth as the descendants of male citizens born abroad before such date.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/14/1997--Introduced. Equity in Transmission of Citizenship Act of 1997 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Technical Corrections Act of 1994 to waive certain parental U.S. presence requirements with respect to conferral of citizenship by children born outside the United States to U.S. citizen mothers.
